description:
Jade & Co Real Estate is pleased to offer this 2-bedroom + guest room apartment with a 1,325 sqft private garden for sale in Al Mass Tower, Emaar 6 Towers, Dubai Marina.

 - Total area 2,924.99 sqft, inside area 1,300 sqft
 - Private Garden 1,325 sqft
 - 2-Bedroom plus guest room/study room
 - “Villa-like” apartment with 3 meter high ceilings
 - Extremely bright and flooded with light
 - Sunny garden perfect for children, dogs and garden lovers
 - Owner occupied, excellent maintained condition
 - Rarely available, large, dual aspect corner unit
 - One of the best positions opposite lovely green space
 - Ideally located in Dubai Marina next to Sobha Realty Metro Station
 - 2 Parking Spaces
 - For viewing schedules/queries Contact Anouck (B.R.N. 56804) 0585386876

Presenting a truly exceptional 2-bedroom apartment with an additional guest room in the ideally located Al Mass Tower, Emaar 6 Towers, Dubai Marina. This property stands out with its unique ground floor location, boasting an expansive garden that sets it apart from the rest. 

Enjoy the serenity of Marina promenade living, where you can immerse yourself in the vibrant surroundings and the stunning views. This is an opportunity to own a piece of luxury and tranquility in one of Dubai's most sought-after locations.

Jade & Co was founded to provide a boutique approach to the Dubai Real Estate market, which caters way beyond beautiful properties, as our exceptional agents source a lifestyle to compliment you. Our purpose is to provide an unrivaled service in the market, whether you are buying, selling, or renting, and our approach allows us to walk alongside our clients at every stage of their journey. For Jade & Co, maintaining long-lasting relationships is at the core of our agency.

Jade & Co Real Estate

This is one of the most popular EMAAR developments to live in within the Dubai Marina. With a great complex suitable for families with an indoor and outdoor play area.

- Squash courts

Sanibel Tower is a high-rise building in Dubai Marina. It is one of the four buildings of the Park Island complex developed by EMAAR Properties back in 2010. It is a freehold property in a waterfront community. This building has 24 floors in total.

Dubai Marina features luxurious residential options. It is quite popular due to the waterfront view it offers to its residents. This community also hosts multiple entertainment options, including Dubai Marina Walk and Marina Beach.

Multiple options are available in the area! Contact us for a viewing today!

contact_options.link: https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=+97145560367&text=Hello,%0aI would like to get more information about this property you posted on propertyfinder.ae%0a %0aReference: maria-5107164%0aType: Apartment%0aPrice: 10,500,000 AED %0aLocation:  %0aLink: https://www.propertyfinder.ae/to/9887351/en %0a %0aAny changes made to this message will result in the enquiry not being sent to the agent.

description:
Rarely available, this high floor, approx. 5,453 Sq.Ft duplex apartment is an irreplaceable showcase of stunning contemporary design overlooking lush gardens with incredible views from every room. Enjoy epic vistas of Downtowns sparkling city lights, Burj Khalifa, morning sunrise and verdant parks. 

From the moment you enter you'll be awed with its dramatic scale, high ceilings and open volume. An inviting and expansive layout, benefiting from two-levels, 3 Bedroom, 3.5 Bathroom + Maids and back of house kitchen. With both north and south exposures, the vast windows and terraces capture the splendor of the skyline beyond.

Serene and spacious, the Primary bedroom suite enjoys sweeping views and includes a large walk through closet and a luxurious bath with soaking tub and rainforest shower. Adjacent to the bedroom at the top of the stairs the hallway is the ideal space for an office or library. On their own wing are two additional private and extremely well sized bedrooms with built-ins and en-suite bathrooms overlooking the boulevard.

An exceptional Living Room with multiple seating areas, and stunning Dining area seamlessly flow together in perfect unison for entertaining, along with the built in wine cellar including humidor under the stairs. They say the heart of a home is the kitchen, and this one benefits from sweeping views, access to the large terrace, waterfall edge island, top-of-the line Miele appliances, and Siematic cabinetry. A superbly appointed powder room, large laundry room, secondary Kitchen and ample storage throughout completes this outstanding home.

Conveniently located a short walk from the retail avenue of Seventh Heaven with access to communal gym, pool and multiple retail and F&B outlets. 

For more information or to arrange a viewing please contact Ryan Almond our resident Al Barari Expert on +971544495251. Alternatively visit us in our office located in the retail avenue of Seventh Heaven.

description:
A contemporary expression of luxury, this mid floor three bedroom home is one of a kind, located in the prime location of Seventh Heaven, Al Barari. 

An expansive 3-Bedroom , 2.5 Bath residence spanning 3,500 Sq.ft with a private south facing terrace - a great space for entertaining with friends and family whilst enjoying nights under the stars in your own private swimming pool. 

- Three Bedrooms 
- High Floor 
- Two Balconies 
- South Facing 
- Private Swimming Pool 
- 3,500 Sq.ft Total Area

The open floorplan boasts a contemporary Siematic Kitchen with built in Miele Appliances, sleek and clean high-end furniture and built in’s with sliding walls of glass accessing one of the two oversized terraces. 

The guest bedroom with ample built in storage could also be used as a private home office that also benefits access to the balcony outside. 

The second bedroom with built-ins and en-suite bathroom with rainforest shower. Whilst the primary bedroom boasts a neutral color palette drenched in natural daylight, walk in closet and large en-suite with dual vanity, soaking tub and rainforest shower. 

The secondary balcony is south facing with a gorgeous Balinese feel, surrounded with multiple plants and trees, a large olive tree is sited at the bottom of the private swimming - a rarity in such an apartment. 

The property comes fully furnished and is offered vacant on transfer. 

For more information or to arrange a viewing please call Ryan Almond our Resident Al Barari Expert on +971544495251. Alternatively please visit us in our office located in the retail avenue of Seventh Heaven.
